mapper.update: update IPO_UNDERWRITER_DEPOSIT set AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BROKERID = #{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, AMOUNT,BROKERID, REMARK, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from IPO_UNDERWRITER_DEPOSIT where BROKERID=#{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, AMOUNT,BROKERID, REMARK, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE from IPO_UNDERWRITER_DEPOSIT
